main event: Dave Blanchard reported a sighting of a large unidentified flying object hovering over Arcada Bay on April 4, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as oval-shaped and approximately 25-30 feet in diameter., The object was glowing brightly and emitting rays of light., It hovered for several minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing from sight., The report is part of case number 6706., The file contains 3 photographs pertaining to the sighting.
witness description: Dave Blanchard, residing at 1060 Arcada Avenue, Arcada, California.
